description: [INC Ransom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1032) has acquired and used several tools including MegaSync, AnyDesk,  [esentutl](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0404) and [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029).(Citation: Cybereason INC Ransomware November 2023)(Citation: Huntress INC Ransom Group August 2023)(Citation: SOCRadar INC Ransom January 2024)(Citation: Huntress INC Ransomware May 2024)(Citation: SentinelOne INC Ransomware)

Team Huntress. (2023, August 11). Investigating New INC Ransom Group Activity. Retrieved June 5, 2024.
